data.name: CHROMA+ELEKTRON
data.detailed_description:
CHROMA+ELEKTRON is a 2D twin-stick shooter.

Return all chromatic energy back to its proper state. Survive against increasingly difficult waves of constructs and collect their energy to unleash powerful weapons and abilities. Your speed and power will know no equal.

Features:

  • Fast-paced twin-stick shooter gameplay, with 2D platformer and shoot 'em up elements.
  • Challenging but rewarding difficulty.
  • Variety of arenas, enemies and bosses.
  • Atmospheric levels and music.
